item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. GitHub cuts AI deals with Google, Anthropic (468 points | 256 comments)
2. Using an 8K TV as a Monitor (182 points | 227 comments)
3. OpenAI builds first chip with Broadcom and TSMC, scales back foundry ambition (40 points | 12 comments)
4. Digging into PlantStudio, a Bit Late (57 points | 4 comments)
5. Writing in Pictures: Richard Scarry and the art of children's literature (182 points | 80 comments)
6. Launch HN: Integuru (YC W24) – Reverse-engineer internal APIs using LLMs (118 points | 48 comments)
7. Ancient Monkey: Pwning a 17-Year-Old Version of SpiderMonkey (59 points | 2 comments)
8. Show HN: Kasama – an IntelliJ plugin to keep track of your coding practices (50 points | 15 comments)
9. How to get the whole planet to send abuse complaints to your best friends (293 points | 62 comments)
10. Scythe Works Without Borders (32 points | 12 comments)
11. PhD student finds lost city in Mexico jungle by accident (66 points | 36 comments)
12. When are two proofs essentially the same? (2007) (37 points | 60 comments)
13. A deep history of Halloween (96 points | 23 comments)
14. InspectMind AI (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
15. GLP-1 for Everything (97 points | 120 comments)
16. The electrostatic world of insects (135 points | 39 comments)
17. Strava was used to locate the most powerful people (25 points | 7 comments)
18. Much of Ireland Is an Ecological Desert. Meet the Man Who Wants to Rewild It (28 points | 11 comments)
19. Vector databases are the wrong abstraction (63 points | 3 comments)
20. Trying Arroost (9 points | discuss)
21. Why Slight Failed: A Slight Post-Mortem (108 points | 44 comments)
22. A return to hand-written notes by learning to read and write (552 points | 174 comments)
23. Show HN: Latex.to – LaTeX to image converter running in the browser (60 points | 32 comments)
24. HTML Form Validation is underused (349 points | 299 comments)
25. Teri Garr, Star of 'Young Frankenstein' and 'Tootsie,' Dies at 79 (31 points | 8 comments)
26. Omnivore Is Joining ElevenLabs (62 points | 19 comments)
27. Who is the skeleton buried by a secret society under this Baltimore bar? (21 points | 28 comments)
28. The unnecessary decline of U.S. numerical weather prediction (148 points | 79 comments)
29. Show HN: Basis – a production focused robotics framework (70 points | 33 comments)
30. The Pentaconta Crossbar and Exchange (44 points | 9 comments)
